column1: The best way to predict the future is to create it.:motivational

It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.:motivational
The purpose of our lives is to be happy.:happy
Heavy hearts, like heavy clouds in the sky, are best relieved by the letting of a little water.:sad
